name: SECT BOT
description: Crypto investors live on telegram & discord, often in multiple private groups, working together to find the next 100x. They share tokens with potential and vouch for them amongst these groups. This can be followed by high praise or uncovering ill intentions. Sect Bot is a telegram group bot that tracks members calls & posts a leaderboard of the best calls in the group. A Telegram bot that tracks cryptocurrency coin “calls” & highlights them on leaderboards.
